scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/static && mkdir -p dist/templates && cp -R src/static/* dist/static/ && cp -R src/templates/* dist/templates/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p ../backend/src/main/resources/static ../backend/src/main/resources/templates && cp -R dist/static/* ../backend/src/main/resources/static/ && cp -R dist/templates/* ../backend/src/main/resources/templates/
